a129ec69b3981ed89c401ab9f69","dweb:/ipfs/QmNteNZabofRGumVmWU8NQQDma8ZvsNcD4sRrwVrM1XkD2"]},"src/interfaces/UniswapV2/IUniswapV2Pair.sol":{"keccak256":"0xbeae878c7d7b88f85193db1377049cb3ceb4fca5a28579a127df1fac486851d0","license":"Unlicense","urls":["bzz-raw://858b19bc7c9d3e930844eb98dd0b62c5f9c64d626160adabfe77399389a11219","dweb:/ipfs/QmSeZPzahwzb2ef8yRio62BQf8JoEhUnrWNTAFBoqQQFtb"]}},"version":1}

returns._0: IERC20 address of the staking token
IWrappedPonzioTheCat address of the Ponzio token vault

params.amount: amount of staking tokens to deposit

emergencyWithdraw().details: This function is used to withdraw the LP tokens in case of emergency. It will send the LP tokens to the user without claiming the rewards.

params.amountEthMin: The minimum amount of ETH the user wants to add as liquidity. This function first harvests the user's rewards. It then adds liquidity to the Uniswap pair with the harvested rewards and the ETH sent by the user. The LP tokens received from adding liquidity are then staked. If there are any ETH or Ponzio tokens left in the contract, they are sent back to the user. Requirement: - The `msg.value` (amount of ETH sent) must not be zero.
params.amountPonzioMin: The minimum amount of Ponzio tokens the user wants to add as liquidity.

sync().details: Only call the vault if the balance is not zero

returns._0: struct containing the user's staked amount and reward debt

params.amount: amount of staking tokens to withdraw

LP_TOKEN().notice: Returns the address of the staking token.

PONZIO().notice: Returns the address of the Ponzio.

PRECISION_FACTOR().notice: Returns the precision factor used to compute the reward per share.

WRAPPED_PONZIO().notice: Returns the address of the Ponzio token vault.

deposit(uint256,address).notice: Deposits staking tokens to the contract.

emergencyWithdraw().notice: Function to force the withdrawal of LP tokens from the contract.

harvest(address).notice: Updates the pool and sends the pending reward amount of msg.sender.

pendingRewards(address).notice: Returns the reward amount that a user has pending to claim.

reinvest(uint256,uint256).notice: Reinvests the user's rewards by adding liquidity to the Uniswap pair and staking the LP tokens.

skim().notice: Function to skim any excess lp tokens sent to the contract.

sync().notice: Convert all rewards to vault tokens

userInfo(address).notice: Returns the staked amount and the reward debt of a user.

withdraw(uint256,address).notice: Withdraws staking tokens from the contract.
